results.title: AMP-dependent kinase/mammalian target of rapamycin complex 1 signaling in T-cell acute lymphoblastic leukemia: therapeutic implications.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ affected @<m>DISEASE_Precursor_T_Cell_Lymphoblastic_Leukemia_Lymphoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054218 @@@T-ALL@@@ cell viability by inducing autophagy and apoptosis.

citations.NLM: Grimaldi C, Chiarini F, Tabellini G, Ricci F, Tazzari PL, Battistelli M, Falcieri E, Bortul R, Melchionda F, Iacobucci I, Pagliaro P, Martinelli G, Pession A, Barata JT, McCubrey JA, Martelli AM. results.title: The metabolic perturbators metformin, phenformin and AICAR interfere with the growth and survival of murine PTEN-deficient T cell lymphomas and human T-ALL/T-LL cancer cells.
results.text_hl: The metabolic perturbators @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Phenformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010629 @@@phenformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_AICA_ribonucleotide @CHEMICAL_MESH:C031143 @@@AICAR@@@ interfere with the growth and survival of @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ @GENE_PTEN @GENE_19211 @@@PTEN@@@-deficient @DISEASE_Lymphoma_T_Cell @DISEASE_MESH:D016399 @@@T cell lymphomas@@@ and @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Precursor_T_Cell_Lymphoblastic_Leukemia_Lymphoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054218 @@@T-ALL@@@/@DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@T-LL cancer@@@ cells.
